sentences: WG III Co-Chair Ogunlade Davidson (Sierra Leone) introduced the Summary for Policy Makers (SPM) of the CCS Special Report (8th WG III/Doc.
1) and the Adjustments to the Technical Summary and Chapters for consistency with the approved SPM (8th WG III/Doc.
WG III Co-Chair Bert Metz (the Netherlands) said that constructive contributions during WGIII-8 had improved the SPM.
Delegates then approved the actions of WGIII-8.
